reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan cute and of great quality. They appreciate its oversized fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Super cute! Exactly what I wanted. It’s over sized! Read more
items.author: Olivia Prevatt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would purchase again!
items.body: True to size and quality is 10/10. Not to heavy. Wearing a medium. Read more
items.author: Dana Romanelli

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute. Oversized. Pilled first time worn.
items.body: Sweater and color as pictured and described. It is truly oversized. Soft. Good quality. Started to pill first time wearing so that stinks. Read more
items.author: CNewsome

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: This is great and runs super big. Size down for a fitted look unless you’re busty. I’m 5’1, normally a medium in tops, but I’m 6 months pregnant. I ordered a large I think, and it fit super loose— great with leggings, covers well! Read more
items.author: Meagan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Cozy
items.body: Super cute! Excited to pair it with leggings, I bought a size up for the oversized look. Read more
items.author: Rach25

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way Too Oversized and Unwearable
items.body: I usually love absolutely everything from this brand, but this sweater was a big disappointment. It was so oversized that it was completely unwearable. I ordered a small, and neither I nor my daughter could make it work or look nice in it. To get a reasonable fit, I would’ve needed an extra extra small, or even smaller. Definitely not up to the usual standard I expect from this brand. Read more
items.author: Gayle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: Love this sweater!! Definitely runs big! Great quality. Read more
items.author: hgmt

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Button's Fending for their Lives!
items.body: Cute, but quality is questionable, especially the buttons. A light tug on any button and that thing is fending for its' life. I'd say also the size is definitely over-sized, so no need to size-up in order to get that "oversized" look. Color is great, but I ended up returning for fear of short button life-span. Read more
items.author: Lindsay Eckman

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, White, Black, Camel, Heather Red, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
